events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the incorrect product sent to me.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving the wrong item.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah from the refund department to handle the customer's request.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I will assist you with getting this refund processed as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received, along with your order number, so I can verify the issue?
Here is a clear picture of the item I got. The order number is 123456789. It's completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for providing the information. I am processing your refund now, and you should receive the money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for handling this so quickly, I appreciate your help with the refund and the clear communication.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please allow a few days for the refund to appear in your account.
We wanted to follow up and ensure you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
